sense.def:
The rear of something
je tisti del nečesa, na primer stavbe ali vozila, ki je na zadnji strani.

seg.quote: He walked toward the rear of the house.
I got out and examined the right rear wheel.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
at the rear of a queue or line of people
, je zadnji v vrsti čakajočih.

To rear children
pomeni skrbeti za otroke, dokler niso dovolj stari, da sami skrbijo zase.

seg.quote: Geraldo has adopted and reared four children.

sense.def:
Kadar konj
rears
ali
rears up
, se postavi na zadnje noge.

To bring up the rear
pomeni biti zadnji v premikajoči se vrsti ljudi.

Kadar nekaj neprijetnega
rears its ugly head
, postane očitno.

cit.quote: pokazati svojo grdo plat, pokazati zobe

seg.quote: Jealousy might so easily have reared its ugly head.
